main event: Arvada police captured an unidentified flying object that turned out to be a large plastic balloon.
interesting points: The object emitted no sound and was visible from three miles away., Residents first reported seeing flares which led to the UFO report., The balloon was about 100 pounds and constructed with a wire mesh., This incident was linked to a series of UFO sightings in the Denver area., The initial sighting occurred at 8:38 p.m. and the balloon was recovered by police at 8:55 p.m.
